TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolBinder1

Docs.summary: Represents a symbol binder for managed code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks **Note** <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolBinder1> is the managed counterpart of the unmanaged `ISymUnmanagedBinder`
interface, one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternative way to read and write debug symbol information.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader (IntPtr importer, string filename, string searchPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader(native int importer, string filename, string searchPath) cil managed
Public Function GetReader (importer As IntPtr, filename As String, searchPath As String) As ISymbolReader
public: System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::ISymbolReader ^ GetReader(IntPtr importer, System::String ^ filename, System::String ^ searchPath);
abstract member GetReader : nativeint * string * string -> System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader

Docs.param: An that refers to the metadata import interface.
The name of the file for which the reader interface is required.
The search path used to locate the symbol file.
Docs.summary: Gets the interface of the symbol reader for the current file.
Docs.returns: The interface that reads the debugging symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When given a pointer to a metadata interface, a file name, and a search path, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolBinder1.GetReader%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader> interface that reads the debugging symbols associated with the module.
